file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-27-02-05 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an operational check of the baggage-compartment check valves. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CLASS-C BAGGAGE BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK 21-27-02-700-801-A ♦ COMPARTMENT VALVES - OPERATIONAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-27-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-27-02-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - OPERATIONAL CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do an operational check of the two check valves of the baggage compartment. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 813 Rear fuselage I C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage compartment H. Preparation (Figure 501) SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: • MAKE SURE THAT THE AIRCRAFT IS DEENERGIZED. • ON THE CIRCUIT BREAKER PANEL, OPEN THE RECIRC FAN CIRCUIT BREAKER AND ATTACH A DO-NOT-CLOSE TAG TO IT. (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. I. Operationally Check Baggage Compartment Check Valves (manual check for free movement and correct seating) (Figure 501) SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) In the baggage compartment, open and close the flapper valves three to five times (Figure 501). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 21-27-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the RECIRC FAN circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 21-27-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
